name: Farm, Fresh, Fast! (GAB Jam: Fresh Start)
name_original: Farm, Fresh, Fast! (GAB Jam: Fresh Start)
description:
**IF WEBGL IS SCREEN IS TOO BIG, CLICK THE FULLSCREEN BUTTON IN THE BOTTOM RIGHT CORNER AND THEN ZOOM OUT (hold CTRL and press the - key)**

This game was made for the GAB Jam: Fresh Start.

You inherit your grandfather's farm and have decided to get a fresh start on life by working on the farm & rebuilding it to what it once was.

WASD to move

Space to interact

Press ESC to pause/change settings. 

Plant seeds & harvest crops to sell to customers.
